Room.Name: The Edge of the Canyon
Room.Description: On the edge of a large canyon cut into the land by a winding, green hued river running through its center. The magnificent walls of the canyon descend down in beautiful layers of reds and browns, with sharp rocks jutting out here and there. The canyon is pretty desolate when it comes to plants, the only green being the moss and lichen covering the rocks near the river.

Exit.Description: To the north you see a sharp incline heading up the cliffs
To the east lies a path headed down the canyon.

Room.Name: The Bottom of a Sharp Incline
Room.Description: The bottom of a sharp incline heading up the cliff. A worn path runs up the the incline winding its way around the large boulders. A single gnarled tree stands beside the path jutting out of the ground at an awkward angle.

Room.Name: A Narrow Path up the Cliffs
Room.Description: A rocky narrow path headed up the cliffs. Bones litter the ground along the path some humanoid, some animal. The only thing around is an old sign

Room.Name: A Broken Ledge Over the Ravine
A Narrow Path Along the Cliffs
Canyon Before the Cliffs of Kylos
Room.Description: You are on the edge of a large canyon which has been cut into the land by a winding, green-hued river running through its center. The magnificent walls of the canyon descend down in beautiful layers of reds and browns, with sharp rocks jutting out here and there. The canyon is sparse when it comes to plants, the only green being that of moss and lichen covering the rocks near the river.

Room.Name: A Narrow Path Along the Cliffs
A Dead End in the Path
Room.Description: You stand at the bottom of a sharply rising, sheer cliff face which stretches up into the sky like a razors edge for at least a half a mile.

Hanging by a Rope Ladder

ExtraDescription.Description: As you take a closer look at the rocks you notice one of them has a small keyhole shape in it. I wonder where the key is.

NPC.name: bloated spider
NPC.longDescription: A spider bloated on the flesh of the dead.

NPC.name: scaly draconia large
NPC.description: Roughly 8 ft in length the draconia is covered in bright scales of different colors that shift when hit by the light. Tendrils of smoke drift from his nostrils, which are positioned above long, sharp teeth set in long rows along his snout.
NPC.longDescription: A large, scaly draconia peers menacingly at you.

NPC.name: hunter scaly draconia
NPC.description: Roughly 8 ft in length the draconia is covered in bright scales of different colors that shift when hit by the light. Tendrils of smoke drift from his nostrils, which are positioned above long, sharp teeth set in long rows along his snout.
NPC.longDescription: A large hunter draconia prowling for food.

Item.Name: old rotten sign
Item.LongDescription: An old, rotten sign is here tilting at an angle.

ExtraDescription.Description: Old and rotting, this wooden sign bears a small inscription.

Item.Name: a dagger named 'Shadow'
Item.LongDescription: A medium sized dagger...looks extremely sharp.

Item.Name: Black Dragon Skull
Item.LongDescription: A helmet forged from the skull of the Great Black Dragon.

Item.Name: Black Dragon Breastplate
Item.LongDescription: A breastplate forged from the scales of the Great Black Dragon.

Item.Name: Black Dragon Gauntlets
Item.ShortDescription: a set of Black Dragon Gauntlets
Item.LongDescription: Gauntlets forged from the scales of the Great Black Dragon.

Item.Name: Red Dragonscale Belt
Item.LongDescription: A belt forged from the scales of the Great Red Dragon

Item.Name: Red Dragonscale Bracer
Item.LongDescription: A bracer forged from the scales of the Great Red Dragon.

Item.Name: Black Dragonscale Leggings
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of Black Dragonscale Leggings
Item.LongDescription: Leggings forged from the scales of the Great Black Dragon

Item.Name: Red Dragonscale Boots
Item.LongDescription: Boots forged from the scales of the Great Red Dragon

Item.Name: dragonscale backpack
Item.LongDescription: An armored backpack with seemingly unlimited storage space.

Item.Name: magic dragon heart
Item.LongDescription: A gem said to made from the heart of a dragon.

Item.Name: grizzled tree gnarled hollow
Item.LongDescription: A grizzled tree, its branches gnarled and twisted, hunches here along the trail.

ExtraDescription.Description: A grizzled, old tree its branches gnarled and twisted in the air. In the center of its dead trunk is a small hollow.
A grizzled, old tree its branches gnarled and twisted in the air. In the center of its dead trunk is a small hollow.
A small hollow in the center of the tree

Item.Name: hollow
Item.LongDescription: A small hollow in the tree
